WITH COMLIST AS( SELECT C.cpt_no, C.cpt_comment, C.cpt_title, C.app_status, C.app_reject, C.cpt_date, C.cpt_code, C.smem_no, C.lec_code, C.cpt_type, M.mem_name, D.dept_name FROM complaint C LEFT OUTER JOIN member M on C.smem_no = M.mem_no LEFT OUTER JOIN student S on S.smem_no = C.smem_no LEFT OUTER JOIN department D on D.dept_code = S.dept_code WHERE lec_code= #{lecCode} AND app_status='STA01' ORDER BY cpt_date desc ), COMRNUMLIST AS( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,COMLIST.* FROM COMLIST ) SELECT COMRNUMLIST.* FROM COMRNUMLIST
WHERE RNUM >= #{paging.startRow} AND RNUM <= #{paging.endRow}
SELECT count(*) FROM complaint WHERE lec_code= #{lecCode} AND app_status='STA01'

WITH COMLIST AS( SELECT cpt_no, cpt_comment, cpt_title, app_status, app_reject, cpt_date, smem_no, lec_code, cpt_type, cpt_code FROM complaint WHERE lec_code= #{lecCode} AND smem_no = #{smemNo} ORDER BY cpt_date desc ) SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,COMLIST.* FROM COMLIST

SELECT C.cpt_no, C.cpt_comment, C.cpt_title, C.app_status, C.app_reject, C.cpt_date, C.cpt_code, C.smem_no, C.lec_code, C.cpt_type, M.mem_name, D.dept_name FROM complaint C LEFT OUTER JOIN member M on C.smem_no = M.mem_no LEFT OUTER JOIN student S on S.smem_no = C.smem_no LEFT OUTER JOIN department D on D.dept_code = S.dept_code WHERE cpt_no= #{cptNo}

AND cldr_start >= #{semesterStart,jdbcType=DATE} AND cldr_start <= #{semesterEnd,jdbcType=DATE}
